name: LUCKY-MD-XFORCE
description: A WhatsApp bot by FrediEzra using Baileys

PREFIX.description: Command prefix to trigger bot commands

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti delete message feature (true or false)

ANTI_BOT_ACTION.description: Enable anti bot actions such as delete, remove, warn (true or false)

ANTI_CALL.description: Enable anti call feature to block unwanted calls (true or false)

AUDIO_REPLY.description: Enable audio reply feature to disable audio reply (true or false)

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Send a message when the bot starts (true or false)

WARN_COUNT.description: Number of warnings before taking action (integer as string)

AUTO_READ_MESSAGE.description: Automatically read incoming messages (true or false)

AUTO_REPLY_MESSAGE.description: Automatically reply to incoming messages (true or false)

WA_PRESENCE_MODE.description: Set WhatsApp presence mode (available, composing, recording, unavailable)

WELCOME_MESSAGE_GROUP.description: Send welcome message when someone joins a group (true or false)

GOODBYE_MESSAGE_GROUP.description: Send goodbye message when someone leaves a group (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_AWAY.description: Automatically react to away messages with emojis (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_HOME.description: Automatically react to owner/home messages with emojis (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_GROUP.description: Automatically react to group messages with emojis (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_ALL.description: Automatically react to all messages with emojis (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Automatically react to status updates using emojis (true or false)

AUTO_REACT_CHANNEL.description: Automatically react to channel messages with emojis (true or false)

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Automatically read status updates (true or false)

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session I'd here for login your device

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Automatically download status updates (true or false)
